# Itinerary

# Day 1 - Austin

Thursday, May 23

  • 5:20pm - Fly to London

# Day 2 - London / Barcelona

Friday, May 24

  • 8:25am - Arrive in London
  • 10:15am - Johann flies to Barcelona
  • 1:15pm - Johann arrives in Barcelona
  • 1:20pm - Fly to Barcelona
  • 5:25pm - Arrive in Barcelona
  • Check-in to Akira Camp Nou Apartments
  • 8:00pm - Yo-Yo Ma: The Bach Project Concert

# Day 3 - Barcelona

Saturday, May 25

  • Camp Nou - F.C. Barcelona Stadium Tour
  • Explore the city

# Day 4 - Barcelona

Sunday, May 26

  • 11:00am - Park Güell and La Sagrada Familia Tour
  • Explore the city

# Day 5 - Madrid

Monday, May 27

  • Travel to Madrid (~3h)
  • ~10:00am - Arrive in Madrid
  • Check-in to AbraCadabra Suites
  • Enjoy the city

# Day 6 - Madrid

Tuesday, May 28

  • 8:45am - Royal Palace of Madrid Tour
  • Enjoy the city

# Day 7 - Córdoba

Wednesday, May 29

  • Travel to Córdoba (~2h)
  • 9:00am - Arrive in Córdoba
  • Check-in to Cerca de la Mezquita
  • 10:30am - Córdoba Walking Tour
  • Enjoy the city

# Day 8 - Seville

Thursday, May 30

  • Travel to Seville (~50m)
  • 10:00am - Arrive in Seville
  • Check in to Hotel Londres
  • Enjoy the city
  • 5:50pm - Flamenco Show & Dinner

# Day 9 - Seville

Friday, May 31

  • 11:00am - Alcazar and Cathedral of Seville Tour
  • Enjoy the city
  • 6:00pm - Travel to Granada
  • 9:00pm - Arrive in Granada
  • Check-in to Princesa Ana

# Day 10 - Granada

Saturday, June 1

  • 9:00am - Alhambra & Generalife Tour
  • Enjoy the city
  • 11:30pm - Travel to Valencia

# Day 11 - Valencia

Sunday, June 2

  • 7:00am - Arrive in Valencia
  • 10:00am - Valencia Bike Tour
  • Bioparc Zoo
  • Enjoy the city
  • 7:30pm - Travel to Palma de Mallorca

# Day 12 - Palma de Mallorca

Monday, June 3

  • 7:00am - Arrive in Palma de Mallorca
  • Check-in to Be Live Costa Palma
  • 12:00pm - Caves of Drach
  • Enjoy the beach

# Day 13 - Palma de Mallorca

Tuesday, June 4

  • Enjoy the beach
  • 11:55pm - Travel to Barcelona

# Day 14 - Barcelona / London

Wednesday June 5

  • 7:30am - Arrive in Barcelona
  • 5:25pm - Johann flies to London
  • 6:40pm - Johann arrives in London
  • 8:30pm - Fly to London
  • 9:55pm - Arrive in London
  • Check-in to London Olympus Hotel
  • Explore London for a night

# Day 15 - London / Austin

Thursday, June 6

  • 11:10am - Fly to Austin
  • 2:15pm - Arrive in Austin
